title: Ticket #4227: Condor_transfer_data blocking condor_q?
description: We have a report from CERN that the schedd stops responding to condor_q requests while a condor_transfer_data command is being serviced. The schedd should be forking a child process to handle each condor_transfer_data, and there doesn't appear to be a limit on the number of child processes. We are waiting further information from the user.
creator: jfrey
